recipes.title: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: Soy sauce, garlic, ginger (for stir-fry sauce)
steps: Cook rice as per package instructions.
Heat a wok or large pan with oil, sauté chicken, remove and set aside.
Stir-fry vegetables in the same pan.
Add chicken back to the pan with vegetables.
Mix soy sauce, garlic, and ginger, pour over chicken and vegetables.
Stir and cook for another minute.
Serve over rice.

recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season, bread, and fry eggplant slices, then drain.
Layer eggplant with sauce and cheeses in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and bake for 25-30 minutes.

recipes.title: Spanish Omelette
steps: Cook potatoes and onions in oil until tender.
Beat eggs, pour over potatoes and onions, cook until set.
Flip omelette, cook other side, and serve.

recipes.title: Chicken Fried Rice
steps: Cook rice, set aside.
Cook chicken, set aside.
Scramble eggs, set aside.
Sauté vegetables.
Combine rice, chicken, eggs, vegetables, add soy sauce and stir-fry.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Sauté onion, garlic, chicken, add zucchini, cook.
Stir in rice, tomato sauce, season.
Spoon mixture into bell peppers, top with cheese, bake.

Add chicken back to the pan with vegetables.

Stir and cook for another minute.
Serve over rice.

Season, bread, and fry eggplant slices, then drain.
Layer eggplant with sauce and cheeses in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and bake for 25-30 minutes.

Beat eggs, pour over potatoes and onions, cook until set.
Flip omelette, cook other side, and serve.

Cook chicken, set aside.
Scramble eggs, set aside.
Sauté vegetables.
Combine rice, chicken, eggs, vegetables, add soy sauce and stir-fry.

Sauté onion, garlic, chicken, add zucchini, cook.
Stir in rice, tomato sauce, season.
Spoon mixture into bell peppers, top with cheese, bake.

recipes.title: Vegetable Fritters
steps: Combine grated vegetables, squeeze out moisture.
Stir in eggs and flour, season.
Heat oil, fry spoonfuls of mixture, flip, and drain.

recipes.title: Ratatouille
ingredients: Sliced red and green bell peppers
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Spread tomato sauce in a baking dish.
Arrange vegetable slices, sprinkle with garlic, herbs, oil.
Cover, bake for 45-60 minutes, uncover, bake 10-15 more.

recipes.title: Chicken and Rice Casserole
ingredients: Cream soup or homemade cream sauce
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix rice, chicken, carrots, onions, cream soup, season.
Transfer to baking dish, top with cheese, bake.

recipes.title: Eggplant and Zucchini Lasagna
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Brush slices with oil, season, bake to soften.
Layer sauce, vegetables, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Repeat layers, finish with cheese, bake 45-60 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken and Vegetable Skewers
ingredients: Chunked red and green bell peppers
steps: Preheat grill.
Thread chicken and vegetables on skewers.
Brush with oil, season, grill until cooked.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
ingredients: Chopped red and green bell peppers
steps: Heat oil, sauté onions, carrots, bell peppers.
Add potatoes, cook more.
Add broth, boil, add rice, herbs, simmer.

recipes.title: Potato and Carrot Latkes
steps: Combine potatoes, carrots, eggs, flour, season.
Heat oil, fry patties, flip, drain.

recipes.title: Baked Chicken with Roasted Vegetables
ingredients: Chopped red and green bell peppers
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place chicken, vegetables in a dish, season, toss.
Bake until cooked and tender.

recipes.title: Stuffed Eggplant
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Scoop out eggplant, chop flesh.
Sauté onion, garlic, chicken, add eggplant.
Stir in rice, sauce, season.
Fill eggplant shells, top with cheese, bake.

recipes.title: Zucchini and Carrot Noodle Bowl
steps: Cook chicken with garlic, onion, set aside.
Sauté noodles, add chicken, sauce, combine.
